node.data: {"title":"Academic Conferences","button":"apply","conferenceDetails":[{"title":"Why?","content":["The purpose of this day is to give both students and researchers the opportunity to share their work.","If you have a paper that you would like to share with others NLP enthusiasts, sign up to present at the Nitro Conferences."]},{"title":"What do you need in order to apply?","content":["a scientific paper or research work, published or not published, personal or as part of a team","a 10-30 minutes presentation","a few words about yourself and the way you're related to the mentioned fields (e.g. work / study / research experience)"]}],"extraDetails":"All applications are subject to a screening process to ensure that they fit the theme.","link":"Attend Conferences","endDescription":"The academic conference has ended. See you next year!"}
